name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
No one should be too surprised by what happened in Chengde.
They already have laws to follow, the only question is when to start enforcing them strictly.
I still need to remind you that no matter whether you use VPN to browse politics, love your country, watch porn or just live your life, you are essentially a criminal the moment you connect to an illegal VPN.

On September 22, the Chinese Consulate General in Japan invited many Chinese in Japan to attend the 45th anniversary of the signing of the China-Japan Treaty of Peace and Friendship. The meeting kept talking about China-Japan friendship, which was obviously different from the atmosphere in China. 
And a Japanese version of "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China" was distributed to each participant on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Japanese Asahi Shimbun, one month after the nuclear wastewater was discharged, about 150 Chinese fishing boats are currently fishing in the waters near Japan every day. The fish from Japanese fishing boats in the same waters are banned, while the fish from Chinese fishing boats are circulated domestically as "domestic seafood"

content: On September 25, the Shenyang Mobile Business Center also began not to allow phone cards to be opened for those born after 00 with non-local registered permanent residence. Those born after 2000 with local household registration need to be accompanied by their parents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One more thing to add: If you are approached by the police for climbing over the firewall, asking you if you know Teacher Li or if you are Teacher Li is their basic operation, don't be nervous. You just need to answer calmly that you have seen it but don't care. It's best to criticize me together with the police (of course I don't know if the person in the article is talking about me, just mentioning it by the way)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, in Maoming, Guangdong, netizens broke the news that sewage was secretly discharged into the sea at Liantouling Beach Scenic Area, and the nearby sea water turned black. The Maoming Ecological Environment Bureau of Guangdong responded to the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, Hu Xitui commented on the incident. He believes that if the person being punished only went to the Internet to write software and did not involve political issues, then this punishment is quite questionable. The "precedent" it set has increased social doubts and is not conducive to China's expansion of opening up to the outside world. This Weibo post was subsequently deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @NotLabeledhuman Lao Hu is a person who can call on everyone to oppose the government on Weibo without being blocked, but these are just drizzles on Twitter.
